channel.title: ~*[Project] RuneBar [Project]*~
channel.description:
[size=10pt][center][u][b]RUNEBAR[/b][/u][/center][/size]
Hello its yhsa here and i have recently started a server for [url=http://www.runebar.org]www.runebar.org[/url]. the owners name is suicidle and he runs the website. we might be in need of a few skilled coders... base is from devolution v7
please post here of what u think and please no negative comments, and join the website if u want: [url=http://www.runebar.org]www.runebar.org[/url] and if u would like to help us out with the dueling glitch and if u have a better version of specs please let me know or post here thanks!
credits: 45% me 45% bullet 5% to the creators of devolution 5% to the makers of 3rd age
what we have accomplished so far:
woodcutting skill fire making skill mining skill smithing skill thieving skill rune crafting skill magic skill Range skill Me lee (chop, slash, lunge, block) Walking NPCs shops god wars (mini game) barrows (mini game) 3rd age (mini game) premium area changed exp rates and some more....
near-future updates: special attacks all NPCs walking slayer skill (almost completed) update on runecrafting more drops less lagg [B]webclient[/B] [B][U]duel glitch fix[/U][/B] (we need help on the duel glitch) and more...
here are some pics:
starting area [IMG]http://i244.photobucket.com/albums/gg21/yhsa3rd/runebarhome.jpg[/img]
wcing [IMG]http://i244.photobucket.com/albums/gg21/yhsa3rd/runebarwc.jpg[/img]
training [IMG]http://i244.photobucket.com/albums/gg21/yhsa3rd/runebartraining.jpg[/img]
runecrafting :) [IMG]http://i244.photobucket.com/albums/gg21/yhsa3rd/runebarrunecrafting.jpg[/img]
magic [IMG]http://i244.photobucket.com/albums/gg21/yhsa3rd/runebarmagic.jpg[/img]
godwars [IMG]http://i244.photobucket.com/albums/gg21/yhsa3rd/runebargodwars.jpg[/img]
barrows [IMG]http://i244.photobucket.com/albums/gg21/yhsa3rd/runebarbarrows.jpg[/img]
3rd age [IMG]http://i244.photobucket.com/albums/gg21/yhsa3rd/runebar3rdage.jpg[/img]
please post here of what u think and please no negative comments, and join the website if u want: [url=http://www.runebar.org]www.runebar.org[/url] and if u would like to help us out with the dueling glitch and if u have a better version of specs please let me know or post here thanks!

item.title: ~*[Project] RuneBar [Project]*~
item.dc:creator: @yhsa2nd yhsa2nd
item.description:
@yhsa2nd wrote:

[size=10pt][center]RUNEBAR[/center][/size]

Hello its yhsa here and i have recently started a server for www.runebar.org.
the owners name is suicidle and he runs the website.
we might be in need of a few skilled coders…
base is from devolution v7

please post here of what u think and please no negative comments, and join the website if u want: www.runebar.org
and if u would like to help us out with the dueling glitch and if u have a better version of specs please let me know or post here
thanks!

credits:
45% me
45% bullet
5% to the creators of devolution
5% to the makers of 3rd age

what we have accomplished so far:

woodcutting skill
fire making skill
mining skill
smithing skill
thieving skill
rune crafting skill
magic skill
Range skill
Me lee (chop, slash, lunge, block)
Walking NPCs
shops
god wars (mini game)
barrows (mini game)
3rd age (mini game)
premium area
changed exp rates
and some more…

near-future updates:
special attacks
all NPCs walking
slayer skill (almost completed)
update on runecrafting
more drops
less lagg
webclient
duel glitch fix (we need help on the duel glitch)
and more…

here are some pics:

and if u would like to help us out with the dueling glitch and if u have a better version of specs please let me know or post here
thanks!
